item.title: Scientific analysis servers
item.description:
Intro  

The scientific analysis (sci) servers are provided for general purpose use by all users with the jasmin-login access role. The sci servers are not directly accessible outside the firewall of the STFC network (JASMIN’s host organisation) so most* users will need to access them via a login server.
